# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Creates a captured structure by deserializing the decoder of a prior captured structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init(from decoder: any Decoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **decoder**: An encoded captured structure object.
title: init(from:)
